channel.title: CVE Feed for Themify -- Post Type Builder (PTB)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themify -- Post Type Builder (PTB)

item.title: CVE-2024-31365|2024-07-12T07:27:54.723Z -- themify -- post%20type%20builder%20%28ptb%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Post Type Builder (PTB) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post Type Builder (PTB): from n/a before 2.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31365|2024-06-04T17:36:28.508Z -- themify -- post%20type%20builder%20%28ptb%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Post Type Builder (PTB) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post Type Builder (PTB): from n/a through 2.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31366|2024-06-04T17:36:52.120Z -- themify -- post%20type%20builder%20%28ptb%29
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Themify Post Type Builder (PTB).This issue affects Post Type Builder (PTB): from n/a through 2.0.8.
